file.name: slack.yaml
file.content:
basePath: /api
components:
  securitySchemes:
    BearerAuth:
      bearerFormat: UUID
      scheme: bearer
      type: http
host: slack.com
info:
  contact:
    email: frikky@shuffler.io
    name: '@frikkylikeme'
    url: https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme
  description: To send message on Slack Channel
  title: Slack
  version: '1.0'
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /chat.postMessage:
    post:
      description: ''
      operationId: Send_Message
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: '{

          "channel":"${channel_id}",

          "text":"${message}"

          }'
        in: body
        multiline: true
        name: body
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Header generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: application/json;charset
        in: header
        multiline: false
        name: Content-Type
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          example:
            example: '{

              "channel":"${channel_id}",

              "text":"${message}"

              }'
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
      responses:
        default:
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                example: ''
                type: string
          description: default
      summary: Send Message
  /conversations.list:
    get:
      description: GET channel list
      operationId: Channel_List
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        content: {}
      responses:
        default:
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                example: ''
                type: string
          description: default
      summary: Channel List
schemes:
- 'https:'
servers:
- url: https://slack.com/api

Error: parse: paths: /chat.postMessage: post: Send_Message: parameters: parse parameter "body": unsupported parameter type body
